content: There is security tags available to clearly mark data as being test data. See the discussion on the security pages of the fhir core http://build.fhir.org/secpriv-module.html#testData

<security>
        <!-- tagging examples as example data -->
        <system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason"/>
        <code value="HTEST"/>
        <display value="test health data"/>
    </security>
Don't forget the leading * but otherwise looks right.
